channel.title: How can I do this?

item.title: How can I do this?
item.dc:creator: @wildskiller wildskiller
item.description:
@wildskiller wrote:

I’ll word it differently.

If the money bag contains 2147483647 coins it doesn’t add any cash to it (I have that down) but if it doesnt contain that, I want it to add cash into it without taking all the persons cash if only some of their cash will make the max amount

public static void addToBag(Player player) { if (player.getInventory().contains(Money)) { player.getInventory().deleteItem(Money, (player.getMoneyBag() == 2147483647 ? 0 : THIS IS MY TROUBLED AREA)); player.setMoneyBag((player.getMoneyBag() == 2147483647 ? player.getMoneyBag() + 0 : player.getMoneyBag() + THIS IS MY TROUBLED AREA)); } else { player.sendMessage("You need to have coins in your inventory."); } }

Read full topic
